name: azure-pipelines-tasks-debugger
description: The Azure Pipelines Tasks Debugger extension provides a set of tools to help you debug your Azure DevOps tasks.

walkthroughs.title: Get started
walkthroughs.description: This walkthrough can help you to set up the environment to debug your tasks.

media.altText: Welcome to Azure Pipelines Tasks Debugger

media.altText: Welcome to Azure Pipelines Tasks Debugger

steps.title: üè¢ Connect to your organization
steps.description:

steps.description:

steps.title: üöÄ Link your self-hosted agent

[Link agent](command:aptd.walkthrough.link-agent)
